pli-tv-kd19:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati pubbārāme migāramātu pāsāde.
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṃghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.3: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante paṭhame yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.4: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto paṭhamo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṃgho.
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.7: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante majjhime yāme uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.8: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto majjhimo yāmo, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṃgho.
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.11: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā nikkhante pacchime yāme uddhaste aruṇe nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.1.12: “abhikkantā, bhante, ratti, nikkhanto pacchimo yāmo, uddhastaṃ aruṇaṃ nandimukhi ratti, ciranisinno bhikkhusaṃgho.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.2: “kaṃ nu kho bhagavā puggalaṃ sandhāya evamāha—
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.4: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sabbāvantaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ cetasā ceto paricca manasākāsi.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.5: Addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ dussīlaṃ pāpadhammaṃ asucisaṅkassarasamācāraṃ paṭicchannakammantaṃ assamaṇaṃ samaṇapaṭiññaṃ abrahmacāriṃ brahmacāripaṭiññaṃ antopūtiṃ avassutaṃ kasambujātaṃ majjhe bhikkhusaṃghassa nisinnaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.6: Disvāna yena so puggalo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā taṃ puggalaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.9: Evaṃ vutte, so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.10: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.13: Dutiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.14: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.17: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosi.
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.18: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-kd19:1.2.22: “Acchariyaṃ, moggallāna, abbhutaṃ, moggallāna, yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāma so moghapuriso āgamessatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.1: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.3: Mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro na āyatakeneva papāto.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.4: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro na āyatakeneva papāto—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.5: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.6: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.7: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.8: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.9: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṃvasati.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.10: Yaṃ hoti mahāsamudde mataṃ kuṇapaṃ, taṃ khippaññeva tīraṃ vāheti, thalaṃ ussāreti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.11: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṃvasati, yaṃ hoti mahāsamudde mataṃ kuṇapaṃ, taṃ khippaññeva tīraṃ vāheti, thalaṃ ussāreti—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.12: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.13: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.14: gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, tā mahāsamuddaṃ pattā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, mahāsamuddotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.15: Yampi, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.16: gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, tā mahāsamuddaṃ pattā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, mahāsamuddotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.17: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.18: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.19: Yampi, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.20: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.21: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ekaraso loṇaraso.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.23: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.24: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.26: muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ, rajataṃ, jātarūpaṃ, lohitako, masāragallaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.27: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.28: muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ, rajataṃ, jātarūpaṃ, lohitako, masāragallaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.29: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.30: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṃ bhūtānaṃ āvāso.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.31: timi, timiṅgalo, timitimiṅgalo, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.32: Santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, dviyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, tiyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, catuyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, pañcayojanasatikāpi attabhāvā.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.33: Yampi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṃ bhūtānaṃ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.34: timi, timiṅgalo, timitimiṅgalo, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā;
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.37: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.3.38: Ime kho, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā asurā mahāsamudde abhiraman”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.3: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro na āyatakeneva papāto;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.4: evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.5: Yampi, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.6: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.8: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ mayā mama sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.9: Yampi, bhikkhave, mayā mama sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamanti—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.10: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.11: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo na matena kuṇapena saṃvasati, yaṃ hoti mahāsamudde mataṃ kuṇapaṃ taṃ khippameva tīraṃ vāheti, thalaṃ ussāreti;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.12: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto, na tena saṃgho saṃvasati, khippameva naṃ sannipatitvā ukkhipati, kiñcāpi kho so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṃghassa nisinno.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.13: Atha kho so ārakāva saṃghamhā, saṃgho ca tena.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.14: Yampi, bhikkhave, yo so puggalo dussīlo pāpadhammo asucisaṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto, na tena saṃgho saṃvasati, khippameva naṃ sannipatitvā ukkhipati, kiñcāpi kho so hoti majjhe bhikkhusaṃghassa nisinno, atha kho so ārakāva saṃghamhā, saṃgho ca tena—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.15: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.16: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā kāci mahānadiyo, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.17: gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, tā mahāsamuddaṃ pattā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, mahāsamuddotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.20: Te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, samaṇā sakyaputtiyātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.21: Yampi, bhikkhave, cattārome vaṇṇā khattiyā brāhmaṇā vessā suddā, te tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitvā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni, samaṇā sakyaputtiyātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.22: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.23: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yā ca loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti, yā ca antalikkhā dhārā papatanti, na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.24: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti, na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.25: Yampi, bhikkhave, bahū cepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanti, na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā paññāyati—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.26: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.28: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.29: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo ekaraso vimuttiraso—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.30: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.31: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.32: muttā, maṇi, veḷuriyo, saṅkho, silā, pavāḷaṃ, rajataṃ, jātarūpaṃ, lohitako, masāragallaṃ;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.33: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.35: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.36: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo bahuratano anekaratano, tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.39: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.40: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo mahataṃ bhūtānaṃ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.41: timi, timiṅgalo, timitimiṅgalo, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā, santi mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, dviyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, tiyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, catuyojanasatikāpi attabhāvā, pañcayojanasatikāpi attabhāvā;
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.42: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo mahataṃ bhūtānaṃ āvāso.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.48: Yampi, bhikkhave, ayaṃ dhammavinayo mahataṃ bhūtānaṃ āvāso, tatrime bhūtā—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.51: ayaṃ, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo, yaṃ disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramanti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.52: Ime kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, ye disvā disvā bhikkhū imasmiṃ dhammavinaye abhiramantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.53: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.60: “nadānāhaṃ, bhikkhave, ito paraṃ uposathaṃ karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.61: Tumhevadāni, bhikkhave, ito paraṃ uposathaṃ kareyyātha, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyātha.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.62: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ tathāgato aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ kareyya, pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyya.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.63: Na ca, bhikkhave, sāpattikena pātimokkhaṃ sotabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.65: Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yo sāpattiko pātimokkhaṃ suṇāti, tassa pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapetuṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.67: Tadahuposathe cātuddase vā pannarase vā tasmiṃ puggale sammukhībhūte saṃghamajjhe udāharitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:1.4.69: Itthannāmo puggalo sāpattiko, tassa pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapemi, na tasmiṃ sammukhībhūte pātimokkhaṃ uddisitabban’ti ṭhapitaṃ hoti pātimokkhan”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.4: “itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.7: “therā kira bhikkhū paracittaviduno amhe bhikkhūnaṃ ārocenti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.8: ‘itthannāmo ca itthannāmo ca, āvuso, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.12: paṭikacceva suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapenti.
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.13: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.14: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapessantī”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.15: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.16: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapentī”ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.1.20: “na, bhikkhave, suddhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāpattikānaṃ avatthusmiṃ akāraṇe pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.2.1: Ekaṃ, bhikkhave, adhammikaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapanaṃ, ekaṃ dhammikaṃ pātimokkhaṭṭhapanaṃ;
pli-tv-kd19:3.3.8: Amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapeti, amūlikāya ācāravipattiyā pātimokkhaṃ ṭhapeti—

pli-tv-kd19:3.9.30: Attādānaṃ ādātukāmena, upāli, bhikkhunā evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.31: ‘yaṃ kho ahaṃ imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātukāmo, kālo nu kho imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātuṃ udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.32: Sace, upāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.33: ‘akālo imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātuṃ, no kālo’ti, na taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.34: Sace panupāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.35: ‘kālo imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātuṃ, no akālo’ti, tenupāli, bhikkhunā uttari paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.36: ‘yaṃ kho ahaṃ imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātukāmo, bhūtaṃ nu kho idaṃ attādānaṃ udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.37: Sace, upāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.38: ‘abhūtaṃ idaṃ attādānaṃ, no bhūtan’ti, na taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.39: Sace panupāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.40: ‘bhūtaṃ idaṃ attādānaṃ, no abhūtan’ti, tenupāli, bhikkhunā uttari paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.41: ‘yaṃ kho ahaṃ imaṃ attādānaṃ ādātukāmo, atthasañhitaṃ nu kho idaṃ attādānaṃ udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.42: Sace, upāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.43: ‘anatthasañhitaṃ idaṃ attādānaṃ, no atthasañhitan’ti, na taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.44: Sace panupāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.45: ‘atthasañhitaṃ idaṃ attādānaṃ, no anatthasañhitan’ti, tenupāli, bhikkhunā uttari paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.46: ‘imaṃ kho ahaṃ attādānaṃ ādiyamāno labhissāmi sandiṭṭhe sambhatte bhikkhū dhammato vinayato pakkhe udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.47: Sace, upāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.48: ‘imaṃ kho ahaṃ attādānaṃ ādiyamāno na labhissāmi sandiṭṭhe sambhatte bhikkhū dhammato vinayato pakkhe’ti, na taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.49: Sace panupāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.50: ‘imaṃ kho ahaṃ attādānaṃ ādiyamāno labhissāmi sandiṭṭhe sambhatte bhikkhū dhammato vinayato pakkhe’ti, tenupāli, bhikkhunā uttari paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.51: ‘imaṃ kho me attādānaṃ ādiyato bhavissati saṃghassa tatonidānaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṃghabhedo saṃgharāji saṃghavavatthānaṃ saṃghanānākaraṇaṃ udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.52: Sace upāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.53: ‘imaṃ kho me attādānaṃ ādiyato bhavissati saṃghassa tatonidānaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṃghabhedo saṃgharāji saṃghavavatthānaṃ saṃghanānākaraṇan’ti, na taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ ādātabbaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.54: Sace panupāli, bhikkhu paccavekkhamāno evaṃ jānāti—
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.55: ‘imaṃ kho me attādānaṃ ādiyato na bhavissati saṃghassa tatonidānaṃ bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo saṃghabhedo saṃgharāji saṃghavavatthānaṃ saṃghanānākaraṇan’ti, ādātabbaṃ taṃ, upāli, attādānaṃ.
pli-tv-kd19:3.9.56: Evaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ kho, upāli, attādānaṃ ādinnaṃ, pacchāpi avippaṭisārakaraṃ bhavissatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.1: “Codakena, bhante, bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena kati dhamme ajjhattaṃ paccavekkhitvā paro codetabbo”ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.2: “Codakena, upāli, bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ paccavekkhitvā paro codetabbo.
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.3: Codakena, upāli, bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.6: Saṃvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.7: No ce, upāli, bhikkhu parisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti, parisuddhena kāyasamācārena samannāgato—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.11: Puna caparaṃ, upāli, codakena bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.14: Saṃvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.15: No ce, upāli, bhikkhu parisuddhavacīsamācāro hoti, parisuddhena vacīsamācārena samannāgato—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.19: Puna caparaṃ, upāli, codakena bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.20: ‘mettaṃ nu kho me cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ sabrahmacārīsu anāghātaṃ, saṃvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.21: No ce, upāli, bhikkhuno mettacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu anāghātaṃ, tassa bhavanti vattāro—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.24: Puna caparaṃ, upāli, codakena bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.26: Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpā me dhammā bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.27: Saṃvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.28: No ce, upāli, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti, sutadharo, sutasannicayo;
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.29: ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ abhivadanti, tathārūpassa dhammā na bahussutā honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā, tassa bhavanti vattāro—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.32: Puna caparaṃ, upāli, codakena bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena evaṃ paccavekkhitabbaṃ—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.33: ‘ubhayāni kho me pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti, suvibhattāni, suppavattīni, suvinicchitāni—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.35: Saṃvijjati nu kho me eso dhammo udāhu no’ti?
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.36: No ce, upāli, bhikkhuno ubhayāni pātimokkhāni vitthārena svāgatāni honti, suvibhattāni, suppavattīni, suvinicchitāni—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.37: suttaso, anubyañjanaso, ‘idaṃ panāvuso, kattha vuttaṃ bhagavatā’ti, iti puṭṭho na sampāyati, tassa bhavanti vattāro—
pli-tv-kd19:5.1.40: Codakenupāli, bhikkhunā paraṃ codetukāmena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ paccavekkhitvā paro codetabbo”ti.
